text: Ic Abba geroefa cyðe & writan hate hu min willa is þæt mon ymb min ærfe gedoe æfter minum dæge.

Ærest ymb min lond þe ic hæbbe, & me God lah, & ic æt minum hlafordum begæt, is min willa gif me God bearnes unnan wille, ðæt hit foe to londe æfter me & his bruce mid minum gemeccan & sioððan swæ forð min cynn ða hwile þe God wille ðæt ðeara ænig sie þe londes weorðe sie & land gehaldan cunne.
Gif me ðonne gifeðe sie, ðæt ic bearn begeotan ne mege, þonne is min willa þæt hit hæbbe min wiif ða hwile ðe hia hit mid clennisse gehaldan wile.

& min broðar Alchhere hire fultume & þæt lond hire nytt gedoe & him man s<../images/etail.gif>lle an half swulung an Ciollandene to habbanne & to brucanne, wið ðan ðe he ðy geornliocar hire ðearfa bega & bewiotige & mon selle him to ðem londeIIIIoxan &IIcy &Lsc<../images/etail.gif>pa & ænne horn.
Gif min wiif ðonne hia nylle mid clennisse swæ gehaldan, & hire liofre sie oðer hemed to niomanne, ðonne foen mine megas to ðem londe & hire agefen hire agen.

Gif hire ðonne liofre sie an mynster to ganganne oðða suð to faranne, ðonne agefen hie twægen mine m<../images/etail.gif>gas Alchhere & Aeðelwold hire twa ðusenda & fon him to ðem londe & agefe mon to LimingeLeawa &Vcy fore hie.

& mon selle to Folcanstane in mid minum liceXoxan &Xcy &Ceawa &Cswina & higum ansundranDpending wið ðan ðe min wiif þær benuge innganges swæ mid minum lice swæ sioððan yferran doqre swæ hwæder swæ hire liofre sie.

Gif higan ðonne oððe hlaford þæt nylle hire mynsterlifes geunnan, oðða hia siolf nylle, & hire oðer ðing liofre sie, þonne agefe mon ten hund pending inn mid minum lice me wið legerstowe, & higum an sundran fif hund pending fore mine sawle.
& ic bidde & bebeode swælc monn se ðæt min lond hebbe ðæt he ælce gere agefe ðem higum æt FolcanstaneLambra maltes &VIambra gruta &IIIwega spices & ceses &CCCChlafa & an hriðr &VIscep.
& swælc monn se ðe to minum ærfe foe, ðonne gedele he ælcum messepreoste binnan Cent mancus goldes & ælcum Godes ðiowe pending & Sancte Petre min wærgeld twa ðusenda.
& Freoðomund foe to minum sweorde & agefe ðeræt feower ðusenda, & him mon forgefe ðeran ðreotene hund pending.
& gif mine broðar ærfeweard gestrionen ðe londes weorðe sie, þonne ann ic ðem londes.
Gif hie ne gestrionen oðða him sylfum ælles hwæt s<../images/etail.gif>le, æfter hiora dege ann ic his Freoðomunde gif he ðonne lifes bið.
Gif him elles hwæt sæleð, ðonne ann ic his minra swæstarsuna swælcum se hit geðian wile & him gifeðe bið.
& gif þæt gesele þæt min cynn to ðan clane gewite ðæt ðer ðeara nan ne sie ðe londes weorðe sie, þonne foe se hlaford to & ða higon æt Kristes cirican & hit minum gaste nytt gedoen.
An ðas redenne ic hit ðider selle, ðe se monn se ðe Kristes cirican hlaford sie, se min & minra erfewearda forespreoca & mundbora, & an his hlaforddome we bian moten.
Ic Ciolnoð mid Godes gefe ærcebiscop ðis write & ðeafie & mid Cristes rodetacne hit festniæ.
Ic Beagmund preost ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Wærhard preost abbod ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Abba geroefa ðis write & festnie mid Kristes rodetacne.
Ic Aeðelhun preost ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Abba preost ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Wigmund preost ðis write & ðeafie.
Ic Iof preost ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Osmund preost ðis ðeafie & write.
Ic Wealhhere diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
Ic Badanoð diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
Ic Heaberht diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
Ic Noðwulf subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
Ic Wealhhere subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
I Ciolwulf subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
Heregyð hafað ðas wisan binemned ofer hire deg & ofer Abban ðæm higum et Cristes cirican of ðæm londe et Cealflocan.

Ðæt is ðonne ðritig ombra alað & ðreo hund hlafa, ðeara bið fiftig hwitehlafa an weg spices & ceses, an ald hriðer, feower weðras, an suin, oððe sex weðras, sex gosfuglas, ten hennfuglas, ðritig teapera, gif hit wintres deg sie, sester fulne huniges, sester fulne butran, sester fulne saltes.

& Heregyð bibeadeð ðem mannum ðe efter hire to londe foen, on Godes noman, ðæt hie fulgere witen ðæt hie ðiss gel<../images/etail.gif>sten ðe on ðissem gewrite binemned is ðem higum to Cristes cirican, & ðæt sie simle to higna blodlese ymb twelf monað agefen.
& se mann se to londe foe, agefe hire erfehondaXIIIpund pendinga.
& hio forgifeð fiftene pund for ðy ðe mon ðas feorme ðy soel gelæste.
Abban geroefan <arfegedal>, his geðinga to Kristes cirican.
